vfx.hwaves.flip: Should the amplitude of the waves flip every frame?
vfx.notesFollowPlayer: Should notes move as well when the player is moved?
vfx.drawAccuracy: Should accuracy be displayed? (Expanded HUD only)
vfx.drawSongTitle: Should the song's title be displayed? (Expanded HUD only)
vfx.drawDifficulty: Should the chart's difficulty be displayed? (Expanded HUD only)
vfx.drawUI: Should the UI be displayed?  (Has priority over other draw variables)
vfx.ignoreNoiseCorrection: Changes the way Noise Chance is calculated.
newHoldDetection: Disabling returns the demo behaviour for holds
vfx.onTopUI: If set to false, UI gets affected by VFX
p.disableCostume: If set to true, makes the player no longer wear a costume
vfx.darkness.enabled: Enables the darkness effect found in BEATROCK.
vfx.holdCulling: Related to the optimisation of holds, mineholds and traces where the end of the hold is too far off screen. Only to be disabled in very niche cases where it breaks your level.
vfx.holdCullExtend: Related to the optimisation of holds, mineholds and traces where the end of the hold is too far off screen. Only to be disabled in very niche cases where it breaks your level.
scrollSpeed: Multiplies the scroll speed set in the level properties
extraHoldLeniency: Adds to the leniency timer for holds. (cannot be negative)
noteRadius: How big the hit radius for notes are (not the same as scale)
objectRotation: Rotates all of the notes by a certain rotation.
vfx.extraTapWidthPulse: Line thickness for extraTaps on pulses
vfx.tapPulseStrength: How much taps should grow by on pulses
vfx.tapWidthPulse: Line thickness for taps on pulses
vfx.angleTwist.offset: How much angles should be offset by at the specified distance
vfx.angleTwist.distance: How far away angles should be offset from
vfx.holdSegmentLimit: How many segments every hold should have (0 disables this)
vfx.holdDistanceLimit: Distance after which hold culling takes effect.
vfx.hglitch.strength: How many pixels in either direction hglitch can shift
vfx.hglitch.resolution: How tall in pixels hglitch "chunks" should be
vfx.hwaves.strength: Controls the amplitude of the screen waves
vfx.hwaves.period: Controls the period of the screen waves
vfx.hwaves.offset: How offset the waves should be
vfx.hwaves.offsetDelta: How much the offset should be changed every frame
vfx.vglitch.strength: How many pixels in either direction vglitch can shift
vfx.vglitch.resolution: How tall in pixels vglitch "chunks" should be
vfx.vwaves.strength: Controls the amplitude of the screen waves
vfx.vwaves.period: Controls the period of the screen waves
vfx.vwaves.offset: How offset the waves should be
vfx.vwaves.offsetDelta: How much the offset should be changed every frame
vfx.pixelate: How pixelated the screen should be
vfx.bgNoise: Allows easing of the Noise event's “chance” variable
vfx.bgNoiseTimeStep: Changes how fast background Noise updates
vfx.hueShift: Shifts the hue of the level by a certain amount.
vfx.flashStrength: How much should the screen flash be visible at any point.
vfx.flashColor.r: Adjusts the red value of the flash easable.
vfx.flashColor.g: Adjusts the green value of the flash easable.
vfx.flashColor.b: Adjusts the blue value of the flash easable
vfx.fisheye.strength: How much should the fisheye effect affect the screen
vfx.darkness.noteLightRadius: Controls the radius of light around the notes
p.lightRad: Controls the radius of light around cranky
vfx.darkness.color: Controls the color channel for the darkness
vfx.canvPos.x: What X position the main game canvas should be drawn at
vfx.canvPos.y: What Y position the main game canvas should be drawn at
vfx.canvPos.r: How many degrees to rotate the main game canvas
vfx.canvPos.sx: Scales the main game canvas horizontally
vfx.canvPos.sy: Scales the main game canvas vertically
vfx.canvPos.ox: What X offset the main game canvas should be drawn at
vfx.canvPos.oy: What Y offset the main game canvas should be drawn at
vfx.canvPos.kx: Skews the main game canvas horizontally
vfx.canvPos.ky: Skews the main game canvas vertically
vfx.homCanvPos.x: What X position the hom canvas should be drawn at
vfx.homCanvPos.y: What Y position the hom canvas should be drawn at
vfx.homCanvPos.r: How many degrees to rotate the hom canvas
vfx.homCanvPos.ox: What X offset the hom canvas should be drawn at
vfx.homCanvPos.oy: What Y offset the hom canvas should be drawn at
p.paddleDistance: The distance between Cranky and the Paddle
p.lookYOffset: Changes where Cranky's eyes are drawn on the Y axis
p.lookXOffset: Changes where Cranky's eyes are drawn on the X axis
p.lookRadius: The radius where Cranky's eyes will follow your cursor
p.faceColor: Changes Cranky's face color channel. -1 shows original colors.  (-1,0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
p.bodyRadius: The radius that Cranky's body is drawn in
p.drawScale: The scale at which Cranky is drawn
p.layer: Changes which layer Cranky is drawn on.
p.ouchTime: How long the pulse from missing a note lasts.
p.lineWidth: How thick Cranky's outlines are (in px)
p.maxBodyPulse: How strong the pulse from missing a note is
p.feedbackAmplitude: How strong the feedback is for hitting with the Paddle
p.feedbackDuration: How long the feedback for hitting with the Paddle lasts
vfx.comboX: What X position the combo counter should be drawn at
vfx.comboY: What Y position the combo counter should be drawn at
vfx.accuracyX: What X position the accuracy should be drawn at
vfx.accuracyY: What Y position the accuracy should be drawn at
vfx.songNameX: What X position the song's name should be drawn at
vfx.songNameY: What Y position the song's name should be drawn at
vfx.difficultyX: What X position the chart's difficulty should be drawn at
vfx.difficultyY: What Y position the chart's difficulty should be drawn at
vfx.uiColor:
Changes the color channel the UI uses (0,1,2,3),
WARNING! Do not use duration with this variable.
vfx.glitchUIElements:
Allows the UI elements to cycle through random strings every frame.

0 - No UI glitches
1 - Combo
2 - Combo and Accuracy
3 - Combo, Accuracy, and Song Name
4 - All UI
